linear

Class LinSubspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • linear.LinSubspace

  • public class LinSubspace
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements methods for handling linear subspaces that are spanned by a set of vectors.

    • Method Detail

      • getDimensionality

        public int getDimensionality()
        Returns:
        Integer that is the dimensionality of the linear subspace.

      • addToDefSet

        public void addToDefSet(float[] vect)
        Parameters:
        vect - Add a vector to the definition set of vectors spanning the linear subspace.

      • removeFromDefSet

        public void removeFromDefSet(int index)
        Remove the specified vector from the definition set.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the vector to remove from the definition set of the linear subspace.

      • removeClosestToVector

        public void removeClosestToVector(float[] vect)
        Remove a vector from the definition set that is closest to the provided vector.
        Parameters:
        vect - Vector that is used for comparisons - to determine which vector from the definition set is to be removed.

      • orthonormalizeBasis

        public void orthonormalizeBasis()
        Orthonormalize the basis of the linear subspace.

      • distanceTo

        public float distanceTo(float[] vect)
        Calculates the distance between the linear subspace and a vector as a norm of the difference between the vector and its projection on the subspace.
        Parameters:
        vect - Vector, given as a float array.
        Returns:
        Distance between the vector and the linear subspace.

      • projection

        public float[] projection(float[] vect)
        Projects the vector onto the linear subspace.
        Parameters:
        vect - Vector, given as a float array.
        Returns:
        Projection of the vector onto the linear subspace.

      • findClosestSubspace

        public static int findClosestSubspace(LinSubspace[] subspaces,
                      float[] vect)
        Find the closest subspace to a specified vector, among a set of specified linear subspaces.
        Parameters:
        subspaces - An array of linear subspaces.
        vect - Vector, given as a float array.
        Returns:
        Index of the closest linear subspace.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float[][] rMatrix)
        Rotate the linear subspace.
        Parameters:
        rMatrix - Rotation matrix.

        public LinSubspace getTransformedSpace(float[][] rMatrix)
